body:
Different customer may have totally different topology, so it is hard to give you an answer  since you only provide so little inputs.

While you can try these:

1. use two totally different environments with different rocketmq broker clusters. When you need to send to gray env, register the grays' name server, when you needs prod env, register the prov's.
2. use the some rocketmq broker clusters, while give a env flag for every topics like: prod_xxxx, gray_xxx; Then, your client uses the topic accordingly.
Are there any logs available for troubleshooting？
When using Dledger mode, replication depends on the Raft protocol, so configuring ASYNC_MASTER has no effect.
Plz refer to [document](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/tree/master/docs/cn).

> Are there any logs available for troubleshooting？

It can be reproduced stably, as long as there are enough news accumulated。You can reproduce it yourself. The phenomenon at that time was that when the message accumulation reached about 30 million, the java process occupied more than 20G of memory, and the master would not respond for a period of time. I guess it is because the accumulation of messages exceeds the memory size and there will be a pause for a while.

[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/builds/36313765/badge)](https://coveralls.io/builds/36313765)

Coverage increased (+0.2%) to 52.01% when pulling **a1df9b54d69653352e017d0b57f17669fe77a72e on ShannonDing:license_update** into **79ed2b6f894ca2655d9b4b23bee141dc635d8d0a on apache:develop**.
Good job ~
Re open a PR, you can close pr

实在没有看懂你的描述，B消费者里面像这个topic下面的tag1发送一个消息。B是消费者怎么会发送消息了。

I really didn't understand your description. In consumer B, I sent a message like tag1 under this topic. B is how consumers send messages.
Provide more powerful functions, hope to provide SPI and hot loading, I guess
是B在自己的业务处理逻辑里面，用一个生产者的方法像A的ta1目标发送一个消息。消息也推到A了。但是A没有返回提交位移。就导致这条消息进入到B的的%RETRY%groupname下的重试队列里面去了。后面重试会被MQ推送给B。这里像A的tag1发送消息失败了。不应该是到A的%RETRY%groupneame下面的重试队列么。为啥到%RETRY%B里面去了

你的描述很可能不符合现实，或者还有一些别的信息没有输入。按照你的说法， B消费了消息1，发送了消息2给A，这时候A对于消息2的消费失败了，这个消息2肯定进的是%RETRY%ConsumerA里面，而不可能进入B的重试Topic的，麻烦检查下是否A B 用了一样的consumer group名字？还是说有别的信息你没有提供。

What you describe may not right as it is, or there are something important but you donot provide here. According to what you provides, if consumer B consumes a message say M1, and then send a M2 message to A(tag1) while A consumes M2 fail, at this time the M2 will be resend to %RETRY%ConsumerA topic but NOT %RETRY%ConsumerB. Please check if your two consumers uses the same consumer group name, or there are really somthing important you do not provide.
good insights! @duhenglucky would you please help to answer?

我遗漏了一些前提条件。我补充一下。AB两个消费者他们的groupname不一样，然后订阅的是同一个topic下面的 tag1，tag2。
B在业务代码里面像topic的tag1发送一条消息 ，A也接收到了但是没有处理成功。然后这条消息我同步控制台发现进入到了topic 为%RETRY%ConsumerB的下面。由于mq默认消费者B订阅重试主题是ALL也就是* 所以导致这个重试消息再推送的时候推给了B。
@jiaoxinnyu 你说的现象不合逻辑，如果是真的如此就是bug了。建议你贴一下能复现问题的test case。

What do you need this label for?
你需要这个标签的目的是什么？

我的代码是消费者1的group 为ExternalOrderClusteringConsumer 订阅TopicExternalOrder下的 tag1,mq默认订阅%RETRY%ExternalOrderClusteringConsumer的tag all
消费者2的group为TopicExternalOrder 订阅TopicExternalOrder下的 tag2,mq默认会订阅%RETRY%order_callback_group 的tag all。是不是因为两个groupname公用一个topic的问题？这个消息的tag不一样 但是topic是一样的 所以导致进入到了消费者2的重试队列里面了
I mean 'good first issue' tag, which tag issues that good for beginners
@jiaoxinnyu 共同监听一个topic是没问题的，检查下你的消费者1发送消息给消费者2的时候是否消费失败了，而不是消费者2自己消费失败。

Listen port (10911) is configurable. Port 10909 is based on the listener port. So if you want to modify port 10909, you just need to modify listening port
listenPort（10911）是可以配置。10909端口基于listenPort处理的。所以你想修改10909端口，只需要修改listenPort就行了
I understand this. Is there a separate configuration option, I need to set it uniquely for each port instead of setting it through port dependence (calculation)

It looks dedicated heartbeat request is required to keep connections to
this port alive. Otherwise, connections would get closed when sending
messages less frequently.

> I understand this. Is there a separate configuration option, I need to set
> it uniquely for each port instead of setting it through port dependence
> (calculation)

Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <[#2585 (comment)](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/issues/2585#issuecomment-760706756)>, or unsubscribe <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AAE4WG45XLVQMSFHW4Z6SDDSZ7UYZANCNFSM4V6RWLAA> .

We are talking about one thing ？
Closed

What if the broker is only temporarily invalid? The current mechanism can solve this problem.

Heartbeat doesn't consume much performance, can it be ignor

如果broker只是临时的无效，这样情况怎么办？目前的机制可以解决这种问题。
心跳没有多少性能消耗，可以忽略不计吧

To provide you with a curve scheme. If the probability of message failure is small, put the failed message into the database and maintain it by yourself.
为你提供一个曲线的方案。消息失败的概率小的情况，把失败的消息放到数据库里面，自己维护。
兄弟，你解决了吗，我也遇到了这个问题

> 兄弟，你解决了吗，我也遇到了这个问题

巧了，没有
老兄，我知道问题的所在了，你是不是没有在`@RocketMQMessageListener`这个注解里面定义你说的这个group的名称，即`@RocketMQMessageListener(txProducerGroup="order_operate_history_group")`,你试试这样看行不行

If you configure this port, both client and nameserver need to support the identification ability of this configurable port.
你配置这个端口，那么需要client，nameserver都需要支持可以配置的这个端口的识别能力。

If you must use this function, please submit an issue indicating that you need this function. If this requirement is adopted, it will be on the agenda

如果你一定要这个功能，请提交一个issue，表明需要这个功能。如果这个需求被采纳，就有在日程里面了

@javaChain @Jaskey Actully，the filterserver-related functions are replaced by TAG and SQL filtering, which brings better security and also provides better execution performance. The relevant code above should not be cleaned up yet.
@honganan Good advice, no doubt, ping @RongtongJin @ShannonDing @zongtanghu @vongosling
@xxd763795151 would you like submit a PR to fix it?

> @xxd763795151 would you like submit a PR to fix it?

@duhenglucky Yeah. I just submitted it.   https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/pull/2608

IMO, it is not easy to define what's right for those guys, what's is not for the newbie. You could carefully check the issues(or prs) using labels to find out what the community is dealing with recently, such as wip like this https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-externals/issues/673.


BTW, to learn a complex open source project, you could start with more documents and more tests.

How to configure SSL certificate on the nameserver and broker ?

> **BUG REPORT**
> 
> 1. Please describe the issue you observed:

can u describe the concrete version and list the code ?
by the way, I want to be a committer of the project, can any Chinese committer of the project help me walk through the progress?  😁

I recently sorted out the usage of fastjson in different model(acl remoting broker client tools and common).
When replacing fastjson with gson, the remoting model will be the most complicated part because we should think about the compatible of lower version client and higher version server.
Based on the situation, I made some tests about the compatiblility when client using fastjson and server using gson. In a result, there are some classes which produce non-standard json string and will cause compatibility problem.

Here is what I thought
1. we could make a new bridge serializable class, and let the non-compatibility protocol class extends it, then through request version to distinguish which method to use to serialize/deserialize the class.
The advantages are the structure of class and meta file will not change, and affect is limited, also the code will be remove easily when client all updated.
The disadvantages are the dependency of fastjson will exists in a long term and the compatible code maybe not graceful.
2. Other fastjson annotation problems could be fixed by using different gson parameters.

I don't think this fix is suitable,org.apache.rocketmq.store.MappedFile#isAbleToCommit returns true under three conditions
1. this file is full
2. more or equal than commitLeastPages pages have not committed
3. commitLeastPages less than 0

this means commit action can be happened on these conditions,not just more or equal than commitLeastPages pages have not committed.so the origional judgement as following is ok
> writePos - this.committedPosition.get() > 0

不建议删除。两个字符串key，加qid，tpicic也就那写空间，保留肯定有它的价值。比如方便数据的追溯等。
扩展应该优先于所谓的干净。
你是不是要进行排序啊。如果数据量多，排序消耗非常大。

> 不建议删除。两个字符串key，加qid，tpicic也就那写空间，保留肯定有它的价值。比如方便数据的追溯等。
> 扩展应该优先于所谓的干净。

如果需要溯源的话也应该只保留delay。表明这个msg是从 哪个schedule queue来的。现在这两个信息，在msg的属性中已经有了，是冗余的。
不进行排序，把原来的那个任务重新执行就行了。
